titleInfo.title: Gonna Howl Tonight
titleInfo.subTitle: A Beauty and the Beast Songbook

mods.abstract: Songs based on the 1987-1990 TV series Beauty and the Beast
mods.note: There were at least six "Gonna Howl Tonight" songbooks. This information is based on Gary McGath's remote recollection, plus information cloned from GHT #6 which hopefully applies to all of them.
